event.title: The FSFE with a booth at Rotlintstraßenfest in Frankfurt am Main, Germany

body.p: The FSFE's local group in Rhein/Main will participate at the "Rotlintstraßenfest" in Frankfurt am Main with an info-booth. We have stickers and flyers available and our ambition is to bring awareness about the Free Software to non-techy audience and excite them about the use and benefits of the Free Software.
